content: स्फीत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [स्फाय्-क्त स्फीभावः] {@--1@} Swollen, increased; <ls>Ve. 5. 40.</ls> {@--2@} Fat, thick, big, large, bulky. {@--3@} Many, numerous, much, copious, plentiful, abundant. {@--4@} Delighted, joyful. {@--5@} Pure; <ls>Bv. 4. 13.</ls> {@--6@} Successful, prosperous, thriving. {@--7@} Affected by hereditary disease. ( स्फीतीकृ means ‘to augment or enlarge’).
